name: Amulet Zero 零物语 - Optimize
description: 某一天，一觉醒来的朵琳，发现自己正置身于这个陌生的小岛上， 独自在树林里走着，没走多远，她遇上了一个哭得很伤心的女孩子，她叫杰西卡……
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / 7 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048MB) Storage: 1 GB available space
